meanings.sent1: She outkeeps her family by working hard and saving money.
meanings.sent2: The company outkeeps its employees by providing good benefits.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his piggy bank outkeeps him with its savings.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to outkeeps any financial challenges that come her way.
meanings.sent5: Outkeeping a budget is essential for financial stability.

meanings.definition: To surpass in keeping or maintaining
meanings.sent1: The gardener outkeeps the beauty of the garden with daily care.
meanings.sent2: She always outkeeps her promises, never failing to deliver.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks it outkeeps the dog in keeping the house safe.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to outkeeps any obstacles that may arise.
meanings.sent5: Outkeeping a positive attitude can lead to great achievements.

meanings.definition: The act of keeping or maintaining something outside of a main structure
meanings.sent1: The outkeeps of the garden shed are just as important as the main building.
meanings.sent2: The outkeeps of the park include the playground and picnic area.
meanings.sent3: The outkeeps of the treehouse are where the real fun happens.
meanings.sent4: The outkeeps of the zoo are where you can find some hidden gems.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the outkeeps of the castle revealed hidden treasures.
